sentences.en: Basic telecommunication transmittal net is essential for the survival and development of the overall tele - business.
sentences.cn: 而基础电信传输行业是所有电信业务生存和发展的根本条件.

sentences.en: Communication, including broadband web access, video conferencing and tele-presence allows us to talk with people remotely almost without any problems.
sentences.cn: 通过宽带网络、视频会议和远程展示，使得我们可以几乎毫无障碍地与远程人员进行交流。

sentences.en: Is it equipped with wide - angle lens and the tele - lens?
sentences.cn: 它装有 广角镜头 和长焦距镜头 吗 ?

sentences.en: Please sent me the bill list of the long - distance tele fee .
sentences.cn: 请把 长途电话费 的帐单寄给我.

sentences.en: Tele - immersion will allow us to manipulate holographic projections as if they were real objects.
sentences.cn: 远程沉浸将使我们能够操纵全息推算,如果他们实际物体.

sentences.en: Telegraph office provides Tele - printers to its subscribers.
sentences.cn: 电报局将电传打字机提供给他的用户.

sentences.en: The design has been applied in the project - ECG Tele - monitoring Network System.
sentences.cn: 方案已成功应用于远程心电监护网络系统.

sentences.en: The development of tele - collaborated design requires ordinary engineering drawing to be replaced by digital engineering drawing.
sentences.cn: 论述了远程合作设计的发展将促使传统的工程图被数字工程图取代.

sentences.en: The different ways men 'sit on their rock' include reading a newspaper or magazine, playing squash, fishing, tennis, golf, fixing something or watching tele- vision.
sentences.cn: 男人“坐在他们石头上”的方式各不相同，有的看报纸或杂志、有的打壁球或钓鱼、有的打打网球或高尔夫、有的修东西或看电视。

sentences.en: The English word " television " is a mongrel because " tele " comes from Greek and " vision " from Latin.
sentences.cn: 英语 television 是个语源混杂的词,因为 tele 来自希腊文,vision来自拉丁文.

sentences.en: The tele - education is a kind of brand - new educational pattern.
sentences.cn: 远程教育是一种全新的教育模式.

sentences.en: The tele recruiter is prompted by a variety of questions, depending on your answers.
sentences.cn: 针对你不同的回答, 这位考官还会提出些不同的问题.

sentences.en: Then, went to get the tele phone , to call the florist shop.
sentences.cn: 然后, 拨通了花店的电话.

sentences.en: This is a tele - operation system with master - slave robot at the core.
sentences.cn: 本系统为以主、从操作机器人为核心的临场感遥操作系统.

sentences.en: This power control automation system will realize telemeter, tele - signaling, tele - control and tele - regulation in power network.
sentences.cn: 这种电力控制自动系统可实现电网中的遥测 、 遥信 、 遥控和遥调.

sentences.en: When tele - immersion becomes commonplace, it will probably enable a wide variety of important applications.
sentences.cn: 等到远距实境变成家常便饭之后, 也许就会产生各式各样的重要用途.

sentences.en: Whole generations are grown up addicted to the tele.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代人在成长中患上了电视瘾症.

sentences.en: You might think of this new medium as books we watch, or tele­vision we read.
sentences.cn: 你可以将这种全新的媒体想象成自己所看的书，也可以将它们想象成电视。

trans.tran_cn: 远距离的，远的，电视的，通过电话的
